title: Roast squash and tomato soup with chestnuts and bacon and croûtons
description: This filling winter soup is pepped up with a few Christmas leftovers, including bacon, brie and chestnuts.
ingredients: 1 butternut squash, cut into wedges, seeds removed
8 tomatoes, skins removed, de-seeded, cut in half
8 pre-cooked chestnuts (you can buy vacuum-packed chestnuts from larger supermarkets or delicatessens), diced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley, to garnish
2 small baguettes, cut in half lengthways
